verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

עֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> Make לְךָ֗ שְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> thee two חֲצֽוֹצְרֹ֣ת <S%H2689><s%> trumpets כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver מִקְשָׁ֖ה <S%H4749><s%> of a whole piece תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> shalt thou make אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> them that thou mayest use לְךָ֙ לְמִקְרָ֣א <S%H4744><s%> them for the calling הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> of the assembly וּלְמַסַּ֖ע <S%H4550><s%> and for the journeying אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמַּחֲנֽוֹת׃ <S%H4264><s%> of the camps

וְתָקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> And when they shall blow בָּהֵ֑ן וְנֽוֹעֲד֤וּ <S%H3259><s%> shall assemble אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> all the assembly אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> themselves to thee at the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בְּאַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> [but] with one יִתְקָ֑עוּ <S%H8628><s%> And if they blow וְנוֹעֲד֤וּ <S%H3259><s%> shall gather אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> before הַנְּשִׂיאִ֔ים <S%H5387><s%> [trumpet] then the princes רָאשֵׁ֖י <S%H7218><s%> [which are] heads אַלְפֵ֥י <S%H505><s%> of the thousands יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וּתְקַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8628><s%> When ye blow תְּרוּעָ֑ה <S%H8643><s%> an alarm וְנָֽסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> shall go forward הַֽמַּחֲנ֔וֹת <S%H4264><s%> then the camps הַחֹנִ֖ים <S%H2583><s%> that lie קֵֽדְמָה׃ <S%H6924><s%> on the east parts

וּתְקַעְתֶּ֤ם <S%H8628><s%> When ye blow תְּרוּעָה֙ <S%H8643><s%> an alarm שֵׁנִ֔ית <S%H8145><s%> the second time וְנָֽסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> shall take their journey הַֽמַּחֲנ֔וֹת <S%H4264><s%> then the camps הַחֹנִ֖ים <S%H2583><s%> that lie תֵּימָ֑נָה <S%H8486><s%> on the south side תְּרוּעָ֥ה <S%H8643><s%> an alarm יִתְקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> they shall blow לְמַסְעֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4550><s%> for their journeys

וּבְהַקְהִ֖יל <S%H6950><s%> is to be gathered together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקָּהָ֑ל <S%H6951><s%> But when the congregation תִּתְקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> ye shall blow וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without תָרִֽיעוּ׃ <S%H7321><s%> but ye shall not sound an alarm

וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests יִתְקְע֖וּ <S%H8628><s%> shall blow בַּֽחֲצֹצְר֑וֹת <S%H2689><s%> with the trumpets וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֛ם לְחֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> and they shall be to you for an ordinance עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> throughout your generations

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תָבֹ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> And if ye go מִלְחָמָ֜ה <S%H4421><s%> to war בְּאַרְצְכֶ֗ם <S%H776><s%> in your land עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַצַּר֙ <S%H6862><s%> against הַצֹּרֵ֣ר <S%H6887><s%> the enemy that oppresseth אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וַהֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <S%H7321><s%> you then ye shall blow an alarm בַּחֲצֹצְר֑וֹת <S%H2689><s%> with the trumpets וֲנִזְכַּרְתֶּ֗ם <S%H2142><s%> and ye shall be remembered לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְנוֹשַׁעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3467><s%> and ye shall be saved מֵאֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H341><s%> from your enemies

וּבְי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Also in the day שִׂמְחַתְכֶ֥ם <S%H8057><s%> of your gladness וּֽבְמוֹעֲדֵיכֶם֮ <S%H4150><s%> and in your solemn days וּבְרָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> and in the beginnings חָדְשֵׁיכֶם֒ <S%H2320><s%> of your months וּתְקַעְתֶּ֣ם <S%H8628><s%> ye shall blow בַּחֲצֹֽצְרֹ֗ת <S%H2689><s%> with the trumpets עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> over עֹלֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5930><s%> over your burnt offerings וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and over זִבְחֵ֣י <S%H2077><s%> and over the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H8002><s%> of your peace offerings וְהָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֤ם לְזִכָּרוֹן֙ <S%H2146><s%> that they may be to you for a memorial לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God פ

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become בַּשָּׁנָ֧ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשֵּׁנִ֛ית <S%H8145><s%> [day] of the second בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> in the second בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> And it came to pass on the twentieth בַּחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the month נַעֲלָה֙ <S%H5927><s%> was taken up הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> that the cloud מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> from off the tabernacle הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <S%H5715><s%> of the testimony

וַיִּסְע֧וּ <S%H5265><s%> took בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4550><s%> their journeys מִמִּדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> out of the wilderness סִינָ֑י <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai וַיִּשְׁכֹּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> rested הֶעָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> and the cloud בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness פָּארָֽן׃ <S%H6290><s%> of Paran

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> took their journey בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> And they first עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> according to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses

וַיִּסַּ֞ע <S%H5265><s%> [place] went דֶּ֣גֶל <S%H1714><s%> the standard מַחֲנֵ֧ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> In the first לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> according to their armies וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צְבָא֔וֹ <S%H6635><s%> army נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H5177><s%> and over his host [was] Nahshon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <S%H5992><s%> of Amminadab

וְעַ֨ל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צְבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשָׂשכָ֑ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <S%H5417><s%> [was] Nethaneel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צוּעָֽר׃ <S%H6686><s%> of Zuar

וְעַ֨ל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צְבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children זְבוּלֻ֑ן <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <S%H446><s%> [was] Eliab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֵלֽוֹן׃ <S%H2497><s%> of Helon

וְהוּרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> was taken down הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> And the tabernacle וְנָסְע֤וּ <S%H5265><s%> set forward בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the sons גֵרְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H1648><s%> of Gershon וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the sons מְרָרִ֔י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <S%H5375><s%> bearing הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle ס

וְנָסַ֗ע <S%H5265><s%> set forward דֶּ֛גֶל <S%H1714><s%> And the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp רְאוּבֵ֖ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> according to their armies וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according צְבָא֔וֹ <S%H6635><s%> and over his host אֱלִיצ֖וּר <S%H468><s%> [was] Elizur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <S%H7707><s%> of Shedeur

וְעַ֨ל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צְבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children שִׁמְע֑וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon שְׁלֻֽמִיאֵ֖ל <S%H8017><s%> [was] Shelumiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צוּרִֽי שַׁדָּֽי׃ <S%H6701><s%> of Zurishaddai

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was over צְבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> And over the host מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children גָ֑ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <S%H460><s%> [was] Eliasaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דְּעוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H1845><s%> of Deuel

וְנָסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> set forward הַקְּהָתִ֔ים <S%H6956><s%> And the Kohathites נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <S%H5375><s%> bearing הַמִּקְדָּ֑שׁ <S%H4720><s%> the sanctuary וְהֵקִ֥ימוּ <S%H6965><s%> and [the other] did set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> before בֹּאָֽם׃ <S%H935><s%> against they came ס

וְנָסַ֗ע <S%H5265><s%> set forward דֶּ֛גֶל <S%H1714><s%> And the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> according to their armies וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צְבָא֔וֹ <S%H6635><s%> and over his host אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <S%H476><s%> [was] Elishama בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <S%H5989><s%> of Ammihud

וְעַ֨ל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צְבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh גַּמְלִיאֵ֖ל <S%H1583><s%> [was] Gamaliel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פְּדָה־ <S%H6301><s%> of Pedahzur צֽוּר׃ <S%H6301><s%> of Pedahzur

וְעַ֨ל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צְבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin אֲבִידָ֖ן <S%H27><s%> [was] Abidan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גִּדְעוֹנִֽי׃ <S%H1441><s%> of Gideoni ס

וְנָסַ֗ע <S%H5265><s%> set forward דֶּ֚גֶל <S%H1714><s%> And the standard מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children דָ֔ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan מְאַסֵּ֥ף <S%H622><s%> [which was] the rereward לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הַֽמַּחֲנֹ֖ת <S%H4264><s%> of all the camps לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> throughout their hosts וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צְבָא֔וֹ <S%H6635><s%> and over his host אֲחִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H295><s%> [was] Ahiezer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּישַׁדָּֽי׃ <S%H5996><s%> of Ammishaddai

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צְבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children אָשֵׁ֑ר <S%H836><s%> of Asher פַּגְעִיאֵ֖ל <S%H6295><s%> [was] Pagiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עָכְרָֽן׃ <S%H5918><s%> of Ocran

וְעַ֨ל־ <S%H5921><s%> over צְבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> And over the host מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children נַפְתָּלִ֑י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali אֲחִירַ֖ע <S%H299><s%> [was] Ahira בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֵינָֽן׃ <S%H5881><s%> of Enan

אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> Thus [were] מַסְעֵ֥י <S%H4550><s%> the journeyings בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> according to their armies וַיִּסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> when they set forward ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לְ֠חֹבָב <S%H2246><s%> unto Hobab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רְעוּאֵ֣ל <S%H7467><s%> of Raguel הַמִּדְיָנִי֮ <S%H4084><s%> the Midianite חֹתֵ֣ן <S%H2859><s%> father in law מֹשֶׁה֒ <S%H4872><s%> Moses' נֹסְעִ֣ים ׀ <S%H5265><s%> We are journeying אֲנַ֗חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> unto the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of which אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of which the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> I will give לָכֶ֑ם לְכָ֤ה <S%H1980><s%> come אִתָּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H854><s%> and we וְהֵטַ֣בְנוּ <S%H3190><s%> will do לָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> concerning Israel
